title: WTB - T206 Cobb bat on & green portrait

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Cobb bat on & green portrait
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for two reasonably priced low grade T206 Cobbs to finish my T206 set:

  * Cobb - Bat On
  * Cobb - Green Portrait
 
Raw, graded, beaten to death & trimmed - I'll take whatever I can get.

I appreciate the help! PM or [URL="mailto:email.jasonstricker@gmail.com"]email me[/URL], thanks!
